title: Build screenshot MCP (Swift capture CLI + Node MCP server)
description: Implement Swift-based screenshot CLI (display/window) and Node MCP server exposing list_displays/list_windows/screenshot_* tools.

title: Make window recording FPS configurable
description: Add optional fps parameter to window recording CLI and MCP tools (default 10) and update docs/tool descriptions.

title: Add window recording (duration + start/stop)
description: Implement ScreenCaptureKit-based window recording in Swift CLI and expose duration/start/stop MCP tools in Node server.
